Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, I believe its true value surpasses $10000. Considering the investment we've made into its development and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $15000. I trust this reflects its true worth and provides an opportunity for us to collaborate on this exceptional piece. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this masterpiece into your possession soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
